option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Aquatrack">
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".ProductionActivity" android:exported="false" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Aquatrack">
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".ProductionActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".StockActivity" android:exported="false" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
package com.example.aquatrack
import android.content.Intent import android.os.Bundle import android.widget.Button import android.widget.EditText import android.widget.Toast import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity import com.example.aquatrack.api.ApiService import com.example.aquatrack.api.LoginRequest import com.example.aquatrack.api.LoginResponse import okhttp3.OkHttpClient import retrofit2.Call import retrofit2.Callback import retrofit2.Response import retrofit2.Retrofit import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory
class LoginActivity : AppCompatActivity() { private lateinit var apiService: ApiService
override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState) setContentView(R.layout.activity_login)
val retrofit = Retrofit.Builder() .baseUrl("http://192.168.1.7:8000/api/") .client(OkHttpClient()) .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create()) .build() apiService = retrofit.create(ApiService::class.java)
val phoneEditText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.editTextPhone) val passwordEditText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.editTextPassword) val loginButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.buttonLogin)
} } }

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <solid android:color="@color/white" /> <corners android:radius="16dp" /> <padding android:left="8dp" android:top="8dp" android:right="8dp" android:bottom="8dp" /> <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/blue_primary" /> <size android:height="wrap_content" android:width="match_parent" /> <shadow android:color="#22000000" android:radius="8" android:dx="0" android:dy="2" /> <size android:height="wrap_content" android:width="match_parent" />
<shadow android:color="#22000000" android:radius="8" android:dx="0" android:dy="2" /> </shape>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <solid android:color="@color/white"/> <corners android:radius="12dp"/> <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/blue_accent"/> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<!-- Select Order --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Order" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerOrder" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp"/>
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/buttonRefreshOrders" android:layout_width="44dp" android:layout_height="44dp" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:src="@drawable/ic_refresh_blue" android:contentDescription="Refresh Orders" app:tint="@color/blue_primary" android:padding="8dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textOrderDetails" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Order details will appear here." android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<!-- Produced Quantity --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Produced Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter produced quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextProducedQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Select Date (vertical stack) --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Date" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitProduction" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="54dp" android:text="Submit Production" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" app:elevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"/>
<!-- Production History --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textProductionHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Production History (Last 15 Days)" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutProductionHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:paddingTop="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<!-- Select Order --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Order" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerOrder" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp"/>
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/buttonRefreshOrders" android:layout_width="44dp" android:layout_height="44dp" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:src="@drawable/ic_refresh_blue" android:contentDescription="Refresh Orders" app:tint="@color/blue_primary" android:padding="8dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textOrderDetails" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Order details will appear here." android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<!-- Produced Quantity --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Produced Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter produced quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextProducedQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Select Date (vertical stack) --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Date" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitProduction" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="54dp" android:text="Submit Production" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" app:elevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"/>
<!-- Production History --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textProductionHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Production History (Last 15 Days)" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutProductionHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:paddingTop="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="16dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textStockTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Stock: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Dispatch Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create Dispatch" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter dispatch quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextDispatchQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Dispatch" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<!-- Stock Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create Stock" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter stock quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextStockQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Stock" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="16dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textStockTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Stock: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Dispatch Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create Dispatch" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter dispatch quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextDispatchQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Dispatch" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<!-- Stock Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create Stock" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter stock quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextStockQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Stock Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No stock date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Stock" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Aquatrack" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_200</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/black</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Aquatrack" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/blue_primary</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/blue_dark</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/on_primary</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/blue_accent</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/blue_button</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/on_primary</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/blue_dark</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:

<color name="white">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_primary">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_button">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_grey">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="blue_dark">#2563EB</color> <color name="on_primary">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_accent">#2563EB</color> <color name="background">#E5E7EB</color> <color name="surface">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="on_background">#222B45</color>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<color name="white">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_primary">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_button">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_grey">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="blue_dark">#2563EB</color> <color name="on_primary">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_accent">#2563EB</color> <color name="background">#E5E7EB</color> <color name="surface">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="on_background">#222B45</color> <color name="card">#DBEAFE</color>
</resources>
